channel.title: Prayer bonuses dont work?!?!?!?!?
channel.description: Hey guys. I am developing my web server (currently in testing) and whenever you try to use prayer against a specific monster, it doesnt change its attack stats. all its hits stay the same. for example. I was fighting Jad, and turned on protect from melee but it didnt help my stats at all. please help!

item.title: Prayer bonuses dont work?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @software software
item.description:
@software wrote:

Make sure u increase the hit in your codes when the prayer is on like:

if(blahblahblahblahb && prayerhere = true) {
codes here

well explained lol but thats the way

Read full topic

item.title: Prayer bonuses dont work?!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Jakejmcabc Jakejmcabc
item.description:
@Jakejmcabc wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:4, topic:292965”][quote author=Jakejmcabc link=topic=387113.msg2899796#msg2899796 date=1249438134]

Protect spells I thought weren’t supposed to help your stats, just give you an advantage, in making an enemy hit less?

thats what i mean. and idk how to do that
[/quote]

Make the hit difference equivalent to 0?..[/quote]
like that makes any more sense to me… New programmer here. not so good at it.
